Text: Great torrent man thank u a lot
Info says this is the AVC format, but when I get the files it is .mkv format.  does anyone know of a HD torrent that is PS3 compatible?

@stabzilla mkv is a container format.  Think like a zip file but without compression.  It actually contains a file for the video and a file for the audio.

MKV is a pretty common format for HD video, so you'll have most luck with SD releases.

Or

 You can "demux" (demix) and then "remux" the files into a single mpeg(H264/whatever), but you'll need twice the space to do that.

I have a ps3 myself and it sucks for playing HD videos from say a media server.  I really wish they would let us use NTFS.
look for the free program mkv2vob
